item.description:
On Cinco de Mayo (May 5th), let's party at Jose McIntyre's again.

It's very close to Coogan's, our Thursday happy hour spot.

You can enjoy their 'special margaritas' and the company of friendly amigos.

Now, seeing that this is what Vinnie and Luis call one of the amature drinking days, it will probably be crowded, so get there early if you want a seat to enjoy the festivities.

Radio station 104.1 WBCN morning team; Fred, Rich, Adolfo, & Crash will be there with a free trip to raffle.

Jose McIntyre's Menu

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be weariing a yellow Grambling tshirt
item.name: Cinco de Mayo at Jose McIntyre's
